name: 维尼修斯·德富里奥
name_full: 维尼修斯·德富里奥 Vinícius DeFurio
introduction: Italo-Brazilian Actor from Sao Paulo living in Beverly Hills, CA. Graduate in the Meisner Program of the prestigious The Ruskin School of Acting - Los Angeles official representative of the legendary The Neighborhood Playhouse School of the Theater in New York City - under TNPHST graduate and former faculty member John Ruskin in Santa Monica, CA. Studied Drama with legendary Brazilian theater director/actor/playwright Jose Celso Martinez Correa at the Associacao Teat(R)o Oficina Uzyna-Uzona, Sao Paulo-Brazil. Born in Sao Paulo, Brazil and formally educated in the United States. Speaks native Portuguese and fluent standard American English.
